title: Dua for Intention of Fasting (Niyat)
bangla: Nawaitu sawma ghadin 'an adai fardi shahri Ramadan hadhal aami lillahi ta'ala.
arabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ عَنْ أَدَاءِ فَرْضِ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ هَذَا الْعَامِ لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى
transliteration: Nawaitu sawma ghadin 'an adai fardi shahri Ramadan hadhal aami lillahi ta'ala.
meaning: I intend to keep the fast for tomorrow in the month of Ramadan this year for the sake of Allah.

title: Dua at the Time of Suhur (Sehri)
bangla: Wa bisawmi ghadin nawaitu min shahri Ramadan.
arabic: وَبِصَوْمِ غَدٍ نَوَيْتُ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ
transliteration: Wa bisawmi ghadin nawaitu min shahri Ramadan.
meaning: I intend to keep the fast tomorrow in the month of Ramadan.

title: Dua for Breaking Fast (Iftar)
bangla: Allahumma laka sumtu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ
transliteration: Allahumma laka sumtu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu.
meaning: O Allah, I fasted for You and I break my fast with Your provision.

title: Dua When Breaking Fast (Iftar Time)
bangla: Dhahaba azh-zhamau wabtallatil 'uruqu wa thabatal ajru insha allah.
arabic: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
transliteration: Dhahaba azh-zhamau wabtallatil 'uruqu wa thabatal ajru insha allah.
meaning: The thirst is gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

title: Dua at the Time of Iftar
bangla: Bismillah, Allahumma laka sumtu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu.
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ
transliteration: Bismillah, Allahumma laka sumtu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu.
meaning: In the name of Allah, O Allah, I fasted for You and I break my fast with Your provision.

title: Dua for Acceptance of Fasting
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
meaning: O Allah, accept from us, indeed You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

title: Dua During Ramadan Nights
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
meaning: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.

title: Dua for Laylatul Qadr
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
meaning: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.

title: Dua for Ramadan Acceptance
bangla: Allahumma ballighna Ramadan wa ballighna laylatul qadri wastaqbilhu minna bikhayrin wa afiyah.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَلِّغْنَا رَمَضَانَ وَبَلِّغْنَا لَيْلَةَ الْقَدْرِ وَاسْتَقْبِلْهُ مِنَّا بِخَيْرٍ وَعَافِيَةٍ
transliteration: Allahumma ballighna Ramadan wa ballighna laylatul qadri wastaqbilhu minna bikhayrin wa afiyah.
meaning: O Allah, let us reach Ramadan and let us reach Laylatul Qadr, and accept it from us with goodness and well-being.

title: Dua After Completing Fast
bangla: Allahumma laka sumtu wa bika amantu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu wa 'alaika tawakkaltu.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ
transliteration: Allahumma laka sumtu wa bika amantu wa 'ala rizqika aftartu wa 'alaika tawakkaltu.
meaning: O Allah, I fasted for You, and I believe in You, and I break my fast with Your provision, and I rely on You.
